QAData.question: Who won between Brighton & Hove Albion and Leicester City on Sun, 19 Sep 2021 13:00:00 GMT?
QAData.answer: Brighton & Hove Albion won 2–1 over Leicester City on Sun, 19 Sep 2021 13:00:00 GMT.
